inclusion.criterion: Type 2 diabetes for at least 3 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Type 2 diabetics on oral antidiabetic medicines and/or insulin therapies
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients taking intermediate acting insulin such as NPH
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has type 1 diabetes, not type 2. He is currently homeless and lost his insulin supply.
